ruleBookInfo.coverUrl: @css:#content table tr:nth-of-type(3) table tr td:nth-of-type(2) img@src
ruleBookInfo.intro: @css:#content table tr:nth-of-type(3) table tr td:nth-of-type(2)@html##.+内容简介：\s*(.+)本书公告：.+##$1

ruleExplore.author: @css:p:contains(作者：)@text##.+作者：(\S+).+##$1
ruleExplore.kind:
tag.p.0@text&&tag.p.1@text<js>
result.replace(/.+来自\s*|(更新时间|全文长度)/g, '').replace(/-\s+-\s+/g, ',').replace(/：/g, '')
</js>
ruleExplore.name: tag.a.1@text

ruleSearch.author: tag.td.2@text
ruleSearch.name: tag.td.0@tag.a@text
